alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jefferson County through 815 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgewater, or near Fairfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Bessemer, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Hueytown, Fairfield, Pleasant Grove, Midfield, Adamsville, Brighton, Lipscomb, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Brookside, Mulga, Maytown, Birmingham Fairgounds and B.j.c.c.. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
